wikipedia_page.main: John Attwood (died 1865) was a British Conservative and Peelite politician.Attwood was elected Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Harwich at the 1841 general election and, becoming a Peelite by 1847, held the seat until 1848 when he was unseated on petition due to bribery by his agents.
